more.requirement: 1. Professional customer service skills: • Greeting Guests, presenting menus, making food recommendations and answering questions regarding food and beverages • Taking orders and relaying to kitchen and bar staff • Using point of sale system • Processing cash and credit card payments 2. Able to quickly learn new menu items and new service procedures 3. Familiar with different kinds of food and beverages 4. Clear communication skills - verbal and written 5. Ability to speak and write in English an advantage 6. Accurate with attention to detail 7. Team-player 8. Honest and respectful at all times 9. High standard of personal presentation, cleanliness and personal hygiene 10. Physically able to stand for long periods and lift heavy trays
more.description: As a member of our team of Ladies and Gentlemen serving Ladies and Gentlemen you will serve Guests by taking orders, serving food and preparing tables. The most important part of your work is to make Guests feel welcome and comfortable when they arrive, during their meal, and when they leave. Even though you may join us with experience from somewhere else you will participate in our intensive career path road map training program to ready you for promotion in 1 year.
more.benefit: • Our staff work an 8-hour roster, which may include split shifts. • In addition to salary and split shift payments our staff may receive tips and bonuses • 12 days paid holidays per year after 12 months • Staff meal, bike parking and other benefits • Great training program to help you develop the professional skills for a long term career in hospitality
